creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text: I just updated Cocoon and still can't reproduce this problem ...
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
I can't reproduce it after cleaning Lenya and Cocoon, and it's also not
reproducable on the zones server ...

creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
After deleting my working copy and checking out a fresh one the error is gone.
Sorry for the confusion.
